org.apache.flink.orc

类 OrcRowInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileInputFormat<Row>
        • org.apache.flink.orc.OrcRowInputFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<Row,FileInputSplit>, ResultTypeQueryable<Row>, InputSplitSource<FileInputSplit>

    public class OrcRowInputFormat
extends FileInputFormat<Row>
implements ResultTypeQueryable<Row>
    InputFormat to read ORC files.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      An BETWEEN predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.

      An EQUALS predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.In
      An IN predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.IsNull
      An IS_NULL predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.LessThan
      A LESS_THAN predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.LessThanEquals
      A LESS_THAN_EQUALS predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.Not
      A NOT predicate to negate a predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.NullSafeEquals
      An EQUALS predicate that can be evaluated with Null safety by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.Or
      An OR predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.
      static class  OrcRowInputFormat.Predicate
      A filter predicate that can be evaluated by the OrcRowInputFormat.

        参数:
        path - The path to read ORC files from.
        schemaString - The schema of the ORC files as String.
        orcConfig - The configuration to read the ORC files with.

                         java.lang.String schemaString,
                         Configuration orcConfig,
                         int batchSize)
        Creates an OrcRowInputFormat.
        参数:
        path - The path to read ORC files from.
        schemaString - The schema of the ORC files as String.
        orcConfig - The configuration to read the ORC files with.
        batchSize - The number of Row objects to read in a batch.

      • OrcRowInputFormat

                         org.apache.orc.TypeDescription orcSchema,
                         Configuration orcConfig,
                         int batchSize)
        Creates an OrcRowInputFormat.
        参数:
        path - The path to read ORC files from.
        orcSchema - The schema of the ORC files as ORC TypeDescription.
        orcConfig - The configuration to read the ORC files with.
        batchSize - The number of Row objects to read in a batch.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPredicate

        public void addPredicate(OrcRowInputFormat.Predicate predicate)
        Adds a filter predicate to reduce the number of rows to be returned by the input format. Multiple conjunctive predicates can be added by calling this method multiple times.

        Note: Predicates can significantly reduce the amount of data that is read. However, the OrcRowInputFormat does not guarantee that all returned rows qualify the predicates. Moreover, predicates are only applied if the referenced field is among the selected fields.

        参数:
        predicate - The filter predicate.

      • validatePredicate

        private void validatePredicate(OrcRowInputFormat.Predicate pred)

      • selectFields

        public void selectFields(int... selectedFields)
        Selects the fields from the ORC schema that are returned by InputFormat.
        参数:
        selectedFields - The indices of the fields of the ORC schema that are returned by the InputFormat.

      • computeProjectionMask

        private boolean[] computeProjectionMask()
        Computes the ORC projection mask of the fields to include from the selected fields.rowOrcInputFormat.nextRecord(null).
        返回:
        The ORC projection mask.

      • openInputFormat

        public void openInputFormat()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: RichInputFormat
        Opens this InputFormat instance. This method is called once per parallel instance. Resources should be allocated in this method. (e.g. database connections, cache, etc.)
        覆盖:
        openInputFormat 在类中 RichInputFormat<Row,FileInputSplit>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - in case allocating the resources failed.
        另请参阅:
        InputFormat

      • open

        public void open(FileInputSplit fileSplit)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FileInputFormat
        Opens an input stream to the file defined in the input format. The stream is positioned at the beginning of the given split.

        The stream is actually opened in an asynchronous thread to make sure any interruptions to the thread working on the input format do not reach the file system.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 FileInputFormat<Row>
        参数:
        fileSplit - The split to be opened.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

        public void closeInputFormat()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: RichInputFormat
        Closes this InputFormat instance. This method is called once per parallel instance. Resources allocated during RichInputFormat.openInputFormat() should be closed in this method.

      • reachedEnd

        public boolean reachedEnd()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Method used to check if the end of the input is reached.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        reachedEnd 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,FileInputSplit>
        返回:
        True if the end is reached, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an I/O error occurred.

      • ensureBatch

        private boolean ensureBatch()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if there is at least one row left in the batch to return. If no more row are available, it reads another batch of rows.
        返回:
        Returns true if there is one more row to return, false otherwise.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw if an exception happens while reading a batch.

      • nextRecord

        public Row nextRecord(Row reuse)
               throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Reads the next record from the input.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        nextRecord 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,FileInputSplit>
        参数:
        reuse - Object that may be reused.
        返回:
        Read record.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an I/O error occurred.
